We are excited about the diverse watershed attributes included in the harmonized Global RIver-lanD (GRID) Database and are delighted by your interest in participating. We warmly welcome anyone passionate about and eager to investigate questions related to watershed sciences within a collaborative group setting to join the project.

If you would like to contribute new data to the GRID database and/or propose collaborative projects to work with us, please consider reaching out to the [Mangement Team](people/people.qmd)
